entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
